results.title: The Shot put
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Track and Field Instruction”.
The two broad principles by which maximum velocity in object propulsion is secured are analysed and then applied to the athlete so that he can “put the shot” the greatest possible distance. Also illustrates training and preparation techniques used to condition the athlete’s body in order to get the appropriate co-ordinated muscle action. Slow motion photography is used to analyse the necessary arm, leg and body movement.

results.title: The Running broad jump
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Track and Field Instruction”.
The technique of long jumping is shown in normal and slow motion speeds. Provides an analysis of the movements and the physical forces that are significant features of this event; shows single “hitch kick” action and outlines training programs and practices to aid the beginner.

results.title: The Hurdles
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Track and Field Instruction”.
Hurdling explained and demonstrated, aided by stop action and slow motion sequences. Includes training exercises for athletes and training procedure for both high and low hurdling being practised under the direction of a coach.

results.title: Tomorrows World
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: [Children at play]
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tomorrows World”.
In rebuilding outdated cities, and slums, architects have designed buildings for adults and playgrounds for children from five to fifteen. However, in studies shown here, children show a marked preference for “adventure playgrounds” which present them with risks and challenges, and the opportunity to play with children of all ages. No other credits available.

results.title: A Perfectly normal day
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Time Management”.
Professor Cake in PhD, Harvard show that a typical work day is filled with interruptions and crisis and goes about showing you how to mange. Some very good advice. Turns a crisis into an opportunity.

results.title: [Return to Michigan]
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “This Week”.
In 1976, tragedy struck the farmers at Michigan. A poisonous chemical, PBB, had been mixed into stock food, and all livestock had to be killed and the contamination was passed on through foods for human consumption causing much illness.
